dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HR 2574 IH: To amend the Fair Minimum Wage Act of 2007 to stop a scheduled increase in the minimum wage applicable to American Samoa and to provide that any future increases in such minimum wage shall be determined by the government of American Samoa.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mrs. Radewagen introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and the Workforce

form.official-title: To amend the Fair Minimum Wage Act of 2007 to stop a scheduled increase in the minimum wage applicable to American Samoa and to provide that any future increases in such minimum wage shall be determined by the government of American Samoa.

section.header: Minimum wage applicable to American Samoa
section.text: Section 8103(b)(2) of the Fair Minimum Wage Act of 2007 (29 U.S.C. 206(b)(2) note) is amended—

subparagraph.text: by striking on the date of enactment of this Act and inserting May 1, 2015; and
by inserting and after the semicolon; and

paragraph.text: by striking subparagraphs (B) and (C) and inserting the following:

subparagraph.text: increased thereafter by such amount and at such time as determined by the government of American Samoa.
